title: Liverpool taxi bomb prompts UK to raise terrorism threat level
content:
1. Liverpool taxi bomb prompts UK to raise terrorism threat level  The Washington Post
  2. UK counter-terrorism police arrest three after Liverpool car blast  Reuters
  3. Explosion outside Liverpool hospital was a terrorist incident, UK police say  Fox News
  4. Hero taxi driver locks terror suspect in car before blast outside Liverpool hospital  New York Post
  5. UK raises threat level to severe after Liverpool blast  Reuters
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
